title.rendered: “Update on IDF Casualties: Details of Fallen Soldier and Combat Injuries from Gaza Strip Conflicts”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesperson regarding the name of the fallen IDF soldier, which has been conveyed to his family: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC020120223IUREBIF

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where the personal details and photos of the fallen soldiers are published and updated: https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, in an event in which Sgt. Sophian Dagesh was killed, a combat officer, a soldier, and a reserve soldier from the 601 engineering battalion, brigade 401 were severely injured in combat in northern Gaza Strip.

Also, a reserve soldier from the 710 Battalion, the Combat Engineering Corps was severely injured in combat in central Gaza Strip.

Furthermore, a combat officer from the 74th Battalion, brigade 188 was severely injured in combat in central Gaza Strip.

The casualties have been evacuated to receive medical treatment and their families have been updated.
